price: 44. Kula hadlana hadal nugul, waa intaasoo uu waansamo ama ka baqo (Alle).
arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا لَّيِّنٗا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faqūlā lahu qawlan layyinan laʿallahu yatadhakkaru aw yakhshā
